        public static java.lang.String handleRandomGen(java.lang.String[] params)

                                                  DButilityFunctions db_handler)
        Function which handles the execution of a query
        Parameters:

      • handleDBFunctions

        public static java.lang.String handleDBFunctions(java.lang.String[] params,
                                                 DButilityFunctions db_handler)

        Parameters:
